mapper.insert: insert into sswh.recruit(title, subject, content, humanResource, phone, email, image, createTime, endTime, salaryLow, salaryHigh, pageshow, orderid) values (#{title}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{humanResource}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{endTime}, #{salaryLow}, #{salaryHigh}, #{pageshow}, #{orderid});
mapper.select:
select iid,title,subject,content,humanResource,phone,email,image,createTime,endTime,salaryLow,salaryHigh,pageshow,orderid from sswh.recruit
title like concat('%',#{title},'%')
select iid, title, subject, content, humanResource, phone, email, image, createTime, endTime, salaryLow, salaryHigh, pageshow, orderid from sswh.recruit
mapper.update: update recruit set pageshow=#{pageshow}, title=#{title}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, salaryLow=#{salaryLow}, salaryHigh=#{salaryHigh}, humanResource=#{humanResource}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, createTime=#{createTime}, endTime=#{endTime} where iid = #{iid}
